description: Try our easy to follow Carrot & Pea Pilaf recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Carrot & Pea Pilaf Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large carrot, peeled and coarsely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the rice several times in cold water, then allow to soak for 15 minutes. Drain thoroughly.

Heat the oil in a heavy saucepan and add the spices. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes and then add the carrot and peas. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes and then add the rice. Stir and pour in the measured hot water. Season well.
Bring to a boil, cover tightly, reduce the heat and simmer gently for 10 minutes. Do not lift the lid, as the steam is required for the cooking process.
Remove the pan from the heat and allow the rice to stand, covered and undisturbed, for 8-10 minutes. Fluff up the grains with a fork and serve immediately.
